sentences.sContent: To help voters make up their minds, this issue contains a 20-page briefing on personality, policy and psephology .
sentences.sContent_eng: To help voters make up their minds, this issue contains a 20-page briefing on personality, policy and psephology .
sentences.sCn: 为帮选民拿定主意，这份期刊含有20页的简报，涵盖个人、政策和选举学的内容。

trans.tranOther: the study of how people vote in elections
